Robyn Inflates in a candy factory

Robyn finds a blueberry pie in her father's kitchen
1111.content:
You have chosen Blueberry.

How will Robyn inflate into a blueberry?
1111.title: Blueberry

choices: Robyn eats it right away,already feeling the effects
She waits until she gets home.
11112.content:
For sweet little 8 year old Robyn Starling although she lived a pretty average everyday life,was a very bright,kind-hearted girl life wasn't exactly picture perfect for her as she was under the complete control of her cruel guardian Aunt Figg and as such although she attended a public school like nost kids her age,she never had any friends stay over at her house or even want to visit her all due to them being utterly terrified of her evil and nasty aunt so mostly Robyn was smart enough to keep in contact with most of them by telephone.

On this particular day however the Third Grade class was on a bus trip to the local Zippy And Tasty Candy Factory,just outside of town as their teacher carefully explained.

"Children today we're headed on a special field trip to one of the most popular candy stores in the nation,the staff was fortunate enough to give us a free tour of the factory but one thing I must ask you is not to touch anything that means no attempting to eat any of the candy,no matter how tempting it is. Does everyone understand?"

"Yes Miss Appletree!" Replied the students as they disembarked from the bus into the factory doors.

Once inside all the young children were in awe of just how big the factory was with dozens upon dozens of delicious types of candy bars,gummi bears,bubblegum,lollipops and of course chocolate in every size and description!

Young Robyn of course was also in total awe as she had never seen so mhch candy in all her life.

"Wow! Look at all this candy! It's even more than what Aunt Figg stores in her refrigerator back home!" It was then she noticed several pieces of candy set apart from all the rest marked as 'Testing Products Please Do Not Touch' but incredibly curious and despite her delicate,normally sweet-hearted nature,the eight year old blond decided to secretly take a piece of what looked like a small blueberry and snuck in her pocket.

So what will occur next?
11112.title: Robyn Inflates in a candy factory

choices: She tries to escape by any means
Robyn slowly continues to swell in size.
111121.content:
As the rest of the students,female teacher and rest of the staff were slowly making their way through the rest of the candy factory,Robyn held back for a second as she pulled out the small strange blueberry like piece of candy from her right pocket,examining it closely.

"Hmmm it does look rather yummy! B-but I really shouldn't eat it,Miss Appletree did tell us not to touch anything but...I...can't...resist....." As unable to help herself,the 8 year old slowly opened her mouth and dropped the candy into it,swishing it around for a bit,greatly enjoying the sweet,sugary almost heavenly flavor before sending it down her throat.

"Mmmmm delicious!" The little girl moaned out loud rubbing her stomach.

"That was perhaps one of the most delicious pieces of candy I ever tasted! But I better get back with my classmates before they notice I'm miss..... HUH?" She stopped midway as she noticed her cute little button of a nose,it was turning darker at first she thought it was merely her imagination but no,her nose was really turning darker and darker in terms of the shade blue.

" Huh? M-my nose...what's happening to it?" Robyn cried out loud as she felt it as it still felt surprisingly normal but what was going on? Then she remembered the warning on that particular table.

"I-it must have been that particular type of candy...it made me...Huh? N-NOW WHAT??" She cried as it suddenly felt like her body or her stomach was starting to feel bloated.

As the girl looked down amazed as her belly contained by her traditional red shirt was slowly getting bigger and bigger.

"Ahhhhhh....OH NO!!" She cried. "P-Please HELP....." But no one was able to hear the little girl who was surprisingly turning bright blue,from her head,to her blonde hair which was turning dark blue to her constantly swelling belly getting larger and larger and that wasn't the only thing that was alarming.

As it felt like there was tons of liquid like some type of juice was literally swishing around in her tummy! As Robyn tried moving around but found it difficult as she was getting fatter and fatter by the minute.

"Ahhhhhhhhh PLEASE HELP ME!! I-I'M GETTING FAT- NO Wait...." As she remembered the strange piece of candy,her increasingly blue colorful body then it slowly dawned on her.

"I-I'M TURNING INTO A B-BLUEBERRY!! Pl....." Robyn screamed frantically as she was virtually unable to move.


"M-MISS STARLING? Robyn? M-My Word? What have you done to yourself?" As trembling she as much as she could,she turned to see everyone,all her fellow classmates,her teacher and the main tour guide staring wide-eyed at her!

"Uh-Oh!" Was all the young girl could say.......

What happens now?
111121.title: Robyn eats it right away,already feeling the ef...

112241.content:
"Alright, Michael. Let me go through this one more time." Said the Artifact store owner to Robyn's Father.

"The only three oldest artifacts i have followed:"

"This silver crown, This Sword of an unknown crew member of Blackbeard or This Arabian Bottle."

"For now until i come back, I will take the bottle." Said Michael.

"Good choice." Said The shop keeper.

Michael offer the shop keeper about $19:00, he took the 19 dollars from him and gave him the bottle in a plastic bag.

"Thank you and have a nice day." Said Michael.

"You too." Said The Shopkeeper.

Michael made it home to His mansion that is also home to his 8 year old daughter: Robyn.

This was part of an errand.

After putting the bottle in a place on the shelf, He stepped into Robyn's Room and Told her baby girl that She will be back in a 2 hours.

She waved Goodbye and closed the door to their mansion.

Robyn's suddenly got curious about the bottle her father bought.

Unknown to her or her father, The act of opening The bottle would unleash a curse with eternal yet magical consequences.
112241.title: Her Father Buys a curse thing at an artifact store

choices: She makes even more wishes for herself
She tries to find a master to serve
She attempts to undo the curse
1122411.content:
As soon as her father left,the young 8 year old girl picked up the tiny glass bottle examining it closely.

"So Daddy managed to buy this at some average bargain mart? Funny doesn't seem to be that big of a deal to me! It's just a old jar!" Robyn muttered as she sought to toss away the glass jar,something caught her attention and she took a glance at the piece of paper that came with the bottle and read it.

"Warning,this bottle is rumored to contain a ancient and mystical curse to whoever opens it will be subjected to the indescribable horror within. OPEN AT YOUR OWN RISK!" As the young girl giggled out loud thinking who would write such a silly notion on a dusty old bottle,she may have been only eight years old,but Robyn was incredibly wise and intelligence for her youthful age,she knew a joke when she saw one.

"What was Daddy thinking? Buying something as simple as a dirty old bottle? A ancient curse? Yeah like I'll believe that...." As she dropped the bottle to the ground and got ready to get started on her homework but soon picked up the bottle again,her curiosity overtaking her.

"Still I wonder if there really is something magical or ancient in this thing? Hmmmm couldn't hurt to take a quick peek!" As Robyn hesitated briefly before unscrewing the cork and opening the bottle.

"Hmmmm nothing's happening! There's no such thing as curses! I knew it,this was simply a trick or hoax!" She shrugged as she looked inside but saw absolutely nothing but invisible air then tossed the bottle aside.

"Daddy was wasting his time and money buying this thing for me. I better finish my book report." As she returned to her schoolwork.

As the day wore on,Robyn kept staring at the bottle now on her dresser,watching for any signs of some mystical,ancient curse but nothing out of the ordinary happened whatsoever and sighing as once her father returned home and tuckered her into bed,Robyn fell asleep immediately not suspecting once she fell into a deep sleep,a bright purple colored fog started to emerge from the bottle and like a puff of smoke,it circled around the small bedroom and whirled like mist,pausing briefly before entering right into the eight year old blonde girl snoring away logs,Robyn of course was totally oblivious to all of this or the bizarre transformation happening to her body.

By the time morning arrived and she got out of bed Robyn upon entering into the only bathroom she and her father shared together,quickly let out a loud gasp.

"Ahhhhhhhhhhhhhhh! W-What is That?" She screamed staring at what would normally be her reflection but was now a bright green creature with her facial features staring back at her.

"W-what happened to me! W-What......" She gasped when she saw she no longer had feet,only a ghostly tail and was literally hovering above the ground,at least five feet.

"Wh-What Am I? A-A Monster!" Robyn shrieked luckily her father still asleep couldn't hear a word.

"No...No wait I-I'm a ghost? No that can't be right! Ghosts are transparent and invisible,a dragon? No that can't be right either! Ohh how I wish I had a book to find out what kind of creature I have become!" And as she said this,a book appeared surprisingly out of thin air as the girl stared flabbergasted at it.

"H-How did I do that? All I said was 'I wish' Wait...A Wish....T-That's it I'm somehow become a genie!" Robyn cried out loud.


What happens now to our mystical transformed heroine?
1122411.title: Robyn opens the bottle and is cursed to be a genie

1122453.content:
" I really hate hot deserts." Said Robyn.

"I should of stayed in my father's tent."

" I Never thought the desert would be so big in Egypt."

"At least i brought a bottle of water to cool me down."

Just then, Robyn feel onto a yellow hot sand.

She got up from the sand and found the source of her tripping object.

She saw something shine a blue light.

She reached down with her hands and dug into the Sandy ground.

Soon, Robyn pulled out a blue glass Bottle.

She opened the bottle's lid and looked inside to see what she thought was water.

It smelled so cold and refreshing.

Without a care and with a huge thirst for something to drink, She took a huge gulp of water down her throat.

Unknown to her, This would be the last time she would have freedom and would soon be taken away.

114.content:
You have chosen Robyn to Grow.

Which way Will she grow?
114.title: Grow

choices: Begin with Robyn's feeding frenzy throughout the town's food supply
The scientist tries to trick the young giant girl.
1142.content:
As once again Robyn will having a very convincing dream where she'll be away from the tyranny of her evil Aunt Figg and in a small American town where there was said to be a mystical fountain created by a mysterious wizard who of course wanted to take over the world! So he apparently created this magical fountain for whoever drunk its water would be subjected to it's curse and in a attempt to destroy thw world and of course young Robyn was totally unaware of this as being incredibly thristy and despite the warnings of the local townspeople,drunk a sip of the magical water and winded up growing to a very alarming 50 Feet tall.

"W-What happened to me? I-I've become a giant!" She shrieked,her loud voice causing a few windows to crack as a few people covered their ears from the sheer volume.

But it also just so happened there was a roguemad scientist who also lived in this town who was studying the properties of this mystical pool hoping to use it for you guessed it-World Domination! Once he saw the titanic 8 year old young girl,he saw his chance for glory.

"Hmmm that innocent little girl has just become a terrifying giant! Maybe I can usethis to my advantage! Maybe if I can turn the townspeople against this little(Big)girl,I can use or trick her into working for me!"

Fortunately Robyn's kind-hearted personality was unaffected by her recent growth spurt as she looked completely terrified at how small everything all the buildings,the tallest now barely reached her right shin and all the people seemed.

"Gasp! Ohh this is horrible I-I'm a MONSTER!!" As tears started to form in her eyes but she still managed to keep her calm state as she was pondering how this could have happened,a brand new problem occurred as Robyn's very appetite was becoming affected by her growth.

What happens now?
1142.title: A fountain grows Robyn to be a giantess to dest...

11421.content:
Robyn's feeding frenzy began when She stretched her arm to grab an ice cream store by it's top.

She shock it and then all the remaining people inside came out falling but unharmed.

Robyn then put the small ice cream store building close to her mouth and swallowed it whole.

Her hunger was only starting to grow more desperate.

Thousands of people came running out of the way before Robyn's giant foot crushed a hot dog factory.

She then walked through the town, not before she moved a giant model stake to the grocery building.

She could not stop it at all.

The bigger she got, The Hungrier she grew.

She then grabbed a giant hand of grown corn from the Cornfield and ate them.

she saw a truck taking away a cargo of watermelons and went after it.

She grabbed the truck by the trailer and then opened it's two doors and started to shake it to eat it's contents.

She let out a huge belch.

Alongside The huge amounts of Screaming people, What happens with it all?

15.content: Maybe you wouldn't mind putting Robyn in a few fairy tales of her own much like Tom & Jerry was? Like her being in the classic Alice In Wonderland,Goldilocks,Little Red Riding Hood or something else?
15.title: other choices

choices: Simply play out the whole 'Alice' scenario
Try to find a way out of this whole mess\nightmare!
151.content:
8 years old Robyn Starling was a very bright,very beautiful young girl who was perfect in nearly every way except one,she happened to be currently a orphan ever since the disappearance of her father Michael,a famous or expert pilot,the youth was forced to live with her incredibly cold and cruel guardian fat,and greedy Aunt Figg: https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/toma... who secretly took control over the house,following her father vanishing but despise all this and constantly attempting to escape,Robyn maintained her sweet-hearted personality not to mention that one day her father would eventually return.

One this particular night however Robyn was unable to sleep as she for the hundredth time took out the small golden locket of her and her father and silently crying.

"Ohh how I wish you were still alive father and could take me away from this place!" She moaned deeply as she was finally able to get to sleep and was soon dreaming a particularly odd sort of dream.


"Huh? W-where am I? What sort of place is this?" Robyn thought as she found herself not only out of bed and out of her Aunt Figg's house altogether but dressed not in her regular blue PJs but in a very familiar blue dress with a black hair bow and black and white Mary Jane styled shoes on her feet.

"Huh? How did I get the way out here and what am I wearing?" The young girl gasped as she took a glimpse of her very outdated attire then took a good at her new surroundings: https://www.google.com/imgres?imgurl=htt...

"Odd it looks exactly like I'm in the fairy tale of Alice In Wonderland......B-but how is this possible?" Robyn wondered to herself just as she was pondering this,a huge white rabbit dressed in a coat,wearing glasses and carrying a huge golden pocket watch came rushing past her muttering.

Oh Dear am I late! I'm Late!" As he rushed past the girl without even noticing her.

As she was getting even more bewildered than ever Robyn's whole jaw dropped.

"I-it's a Rabbit-T-the White Rabbit like from the book! Then-Then I-I really am in the fairy tale book of Alice In Wonderland!!" Robyn just stood there dumbfounded unable to take in what was going on then looking again at her changed clothes,at the scurrying imaginary bunny,it slowly dawned on her.

"I-If this is truly Wonderland and I'm not dreaming then...that means....I'M ALICE HERSELF!!" She cried out loud,hands on her cheeks in shock.

Finally after a hour of thinking about it,Robyn decides to....
151.title: Maybe Robyn In Wonderland

choices: Immediately felt the effects of shrinking
1511.content:
As terrified as she really was,Robyn just decided to go along with the ride and chase after the imaginary rabbit in the waist coat and pocket watch.

"Hey,Hey M-Mr. Rabbit...Please Wait...." She cried running after him to which of course he completely ignored her and darted into a very familiar hole in the ground.

"Ohh it's that particular hole huh?" Robyn thought to herself looking at it.

"Well(gulp)I better get this over with..." And plugging her nose as if about to dive into a kiddie pool,she leapt into the hole after the bunny.

A few centimeters down into the dusty,incredibly pitch black hole and Robyn was already having problems breathing but yet thankfully,she was able to use her too large blue dress as a parachute to gently float down and as she did,she saw all the bizarre objects seemly floating in midair like cuckoo clocks,a map of the globe,tables,lamps etc but paid little attention to them,focused on her goal.

Once she manage to finally float all the way down towards the bottom and land in that strange red checkered board room,Robyn stood up and ran again after the scurrying rabbit who darted into the small talking door and disappeared.

"Hmm okay I guess I'm supposed to talk to the doorknob now and change sizes! Alright well here goes nothing...Er hello M-Mr. Doorknob..." As she approached it but was in for a shock as it was just a ordinary door,no mouth or way to speak at all.

"Huh? I...it's no real? Well that's a relief! This must be the story book of Alice In Wonderland then. Okay I guess I still have to drink the magic potion in order to get through it!" Robyn thought as she grabbed hold of the little red bottle with the label that read:Drink Me.

" Well here goes..." As she took a sip and...
1511.title: Simply play out the whole 'Alice' scenario

What other most popular fairy tales would you like to have Robyn be the main character in?

Robyn becomes a Snow Queen, Robyn a young mermaid has a crush on a human prince ( Same age ), Robyn for being so greedy is punished to be a hideous beast princess, Robyn becomes a Prince kid's Girlfriend by the help of a fairy, or something else?
154.title: Something else

choices: Explore more of Robyn's life under the sea
Skip to the part where she visits the sea witch
Skip ahead where Robyn's already a human herself
1542.content:
Once upon a time deep under the vast blue sea in the Pacific there secretly existed mythic half human,half-fish creatures known specifically as mermaids or merfolk as they remained hidden from the surface world and were ruled by the wise and benign King Poisdeon(not the Greek sea god but a different one) as it was his careful laws and responsibility to safeguard both his subjects and the rest of the ocean's inhabitants from harm,especially the creatures who dwelled above called humans.

Now the king had six daughters in all,every one of them was incredibly beautiful but his personal favorite was the youngest,a young 15 year old named Robyn who had long gorgeous blonde hair,the deepest aqua marie blue eyes and a slim feature as she was among the kindest of all the merfolk and although she had plenty of friends,her favorite was a little red fish named Guppy as they did practically everything together.

On this particular day as she was busy exploring the Great Barrier Reef near the Australian coastline Robyn happened to notice one of those enormous and strange wooden things above the sea's surface called ships,normally they were either tint containing only a handful of humans which she usually avoided but this one was far larger and had a entire multitude of humans all dressed in odd clothing but as she curiously watched and spied on them all celebrating onboard the strange vessel floating in the middle of nowhere,there was one in particular that caught her attention a incredibly handsome one dressed in navy blue clothes with a silver crown on his head,unknown to the mermaid princess,this human happened to be a prince of a unknown and distant country celebrating his birthday today so several of his subjects took him on a special voyage to a neighboring country.

Once Robyn laid eyes upon this young man,she immediately fell in heads over heels for him and this is where our actual story really begins....


Where shall the story continue from this point?
1542.title: The Little Mermaid Robyn

1545.title: Other Fairy tale stories

info.brief_description: Do what you shall do with Robyn Starling from Tom and Jerry: The Movie.
info.description:
Welcome to my latest Interactive story.

A Tribute to Robyn Starling from Tom and Jerry The Movie.

In this Interactive, You are free to do with her whatever you want.

There are just a few rules that You must obey.

1. Robyn Starling is the main focused character of this.
2. Every Chapter written must be written well and with great grammar.
3. Transformations are also one of the many things you can do with her.
4.No Weight gain.
5. Age Regression and Progression is welcome.
6. Transformations for her can be Modern or Mythical Creatures
7. She can appear as the third main character next to Tom and Jerry in other movies.
8. Inflations like The Wonka Blueberry is welcome.
9. Your own Tom and Jerry Movie Staring Robyn is welcome.
10. Have fun with her!
info.pretty_title: Tom and Jerry Robyn Starling Interactive
